name: Electrike
author: Sanosuke Sakuma
flavor_text: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrier
ancient_trait.effect: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card (excluding Pokémon Tools and Stadium cards), prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
